https://image.tmdb.org/t/p/w500/3mInLZyPOVLsZRsBwNHi3UJXXnm.jpg Buddy is a young boy on the cusp of adolescence, whose life is filled with familial love, childhood hijinks, and a blossoming romance. Yet, with his beloved hometown caught up in increasing turmoil, his family faces a momentous choice: hope the conflict will pass or leave everything they know behind for a new life. Belfast
